item.title: 乐观情绪消退，全球基金重新抛售中国股票
item.description: 由于对经济和盈利放缓的担忧盖过了对政策的乐观情绪，外国投资者再次逃离中国股市，缩短了连续四个月的资金流入。【原文：Foreign investors are fleeing Chinese stocks once again, cutting short a four-month stretch of inflows as concerns over the slowing economy and earnings overshadow policy optimism.】

item.title: 美国数据公布前，石油陷入 2021 年以来最紧张的交易区间
item.description: 在美国经济数据可能为更广泛的市场定下基调之前，石油维持在2021年以来最窄的周交易区间。【原文：Oil held in the narrowest weekly trading range since 2021, ahead of US economic data that may help set the tone for broader markets.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。在通胀数据公布之前，交易员们纷纷买入国债。高盛（Goldman Sachs）发出私募股权时代结束的信号。国际货币基金组织（IMF）就高风险债务抨击美国。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Traders pile into Treasuries ahead of an inflation reading. Goldman Sachs signals the end of an era in private equity. The IMF blasts the US over risky debt. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 随着债券包容性的开始，印度将受到全球更多关注
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）周五将印度政府债券纳入其新兴市场指数，向更广泛的投资者开放这个价值 1.3 万亿美元的市场，届时印度将吸引数十亿美元的资金流入。【原文：India is set to lure billions of dollars more inflows when JPMorgan Chase & Co. adds the nation’s government bonds to its emerging markets index on Friday, opening up a $1.3 trillion market to a broader range of investors.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，国债反弹至美国 PCE：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市上涨之后，亚洲股市也将上涨，而在美联储周五公布其首选通胀指标之前，国债也将上涨。【原文：Equities in Asia are set to rise after gains on Wall Street, while Treasuries rallied ahead of the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation gauge due Friday.】

item.title: Citadel 收购高盛校友公司，在日本开展电力交易
item.description: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的 Citadel 公司正在收购能源电网公司（Energy Grid Corp.【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel is buying Energy Grid Corp., a company that trades and sells power products, as the hedge fund firm expands its commodities business in Japan.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称津巴布韦 ZiG 货币结束了不稳定局势
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，津巴布韦在今年第二季度推出的金银支持货币有助于结束困扰该国经济的不稳定局面。【原文：The International Monetary Fund says the introduction of a bullion-backed currency by Zimbabwe in the second-quarter of this year has helped to end instability that had plagued the economy.】

item.title: 亚洲企业本季度售出创纪录的 5900 亿美元地方债券
item.description: 亚太地区的公司在第二季度售出了创纪录数量的本币债券，因为借款人利用了国内比美元更便宜的资金。【原文：Companies around the Asia Pacific region sold a record amount of local-currency bonds in the second quarter, as borrowers took advantage of cheaper funding at home compared with in dollars.】

item.title: 穆迪将哥伦比亚增长放缓的前景展望下调至负面
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将哥伦比亚的信用展望下调为负面，理由是经济增长乏力对政府收入造成了影响。【原文：Colombia’s credit outlook was cut to negative by Moody’s Ratings, which cited the impact of sluggish economic growth on government revenue.】

item.title: 为什么印度即将迎来金融业的爆发时刻？
item.description: 这个世界上增长最快的主要经济体拥有地球上最多的人口，却从未与全球金融机器完全接轨。但从 6 月 28 日星期五开始，外国投资者将有机会进入一个他们渴望已久的重要增长市场，或者至少是一个具有巨大潜力的市场。【原文：The world’s fastest-growing major economy, which has the largest population on the planet, has never been fully connected to the global finance machine. But starting on Friday, June 28, foreign investors will gain access to a significant growth market — or at least one with massive potential — they have long craved.】

item.title: 墨西哥财政部长在伦敦会议上承诺温和政策
item.description: 据知情人士透露，墨西哥财政部长本周在伦敦会见了投资者，向他们保证当选总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）将缓和计划中的司法改革的影响，并实现减少赤字的目标。【原文：Mexico’s finance minister met with investors in London this week to reassure them that President-elect Claudia Sheinbaum will moderate the impact of a planned judicial overhaul and reach its goal for a smaller deficit, according to people with knowledge of the discussions.】

item.title: 诺基亚探讨收购美国网络公司英飞朗
item.description: 据知情人士透露，诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）正在探讨收购光通信设备制造商英飞朗公司（Infinera Corp.【原文：Nokia Oyj is exploring a potential acquisition of Infinera Corp., a maker of optical telecommunications equipment, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 大银行将支付 4,600 万美元解决掉期交易合谋指控
item.description: 包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）、摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Ten major US and European banks, including Goldman Sachs Group Inc., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and BNP Paribas SA, plan to pay a combined $46 million to end a lengthy legal battle with pension plans that accused them of conspiring to block competitors in interest-rate swaps trading.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织就风险赤字、债务、贸易规则和银行问题抨击美国
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周四表示，美国的赤字过大，债务负担过重，并警告美国日益激进的贸易政策会带来危险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Thursday said the US is running deficits that are too big and is weighed down by too much debt, and warned of dangers from its increasingly aggressive trade policies.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长为即将到来的加息泼冷水
item.description: 巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）表示，巴西央行尚未考虑加息，尽管在决策者上周停止长达一年的宽松周期后，交易商押注加息。【原文：Brazil’s central bank isn’t yet considering interest rate increases, chief Roberto Campos Neto said, even as traders bet on hikes after policymakers halted their yearlong easing cycle last week.】

item.title: 肯尼亚抗议死亡事件呼应数十年来对国际货币基金组织的愤怒
item.description: 本周，肯尼亚因威廉-鲁托总统征收新税而引发的致命抗议活动，其矛头也指向了国际货币基金组织，这与数十年来针对全球贷款机构的批评如出一辙。【原文：Public anger driving the deadly protests in Kenya this week over President William Ruto’s new taxes is also aimed at the International Monetary Fund, echoing decades of criticism directed at the global lender.】

item.title: 咆哮的小猫 "在 X 上发布狗狗图片，Chewy 和 Petco 股价飙升
item.description: 凯斯-吉尔（Keith Gill）在网上被称为 "咆哮的小猫"（Roaring Kitty），他在 X 上发布了一个狗狗的卡通形象后，Chewy 公司和 Petco Health and Wellness 公司的股价周四大涨。【原文：Chewy Inc. and Petco Health and Wellness Co. shares surged on Thursday after Keith Gill — known online as “Roaring Kitty” — posted a cartoon image of a dog on X.】

item.title: 参议院调查大石油公司与欧佩克勾结的可能性
item.description: 美国参议院一个委员会正在调查石油生产商是否与欧佩克（OPEC）非法协调抬高价格，此前有指控称先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.【原文：A US Senate committee is investigating whether oil producers are illegally coordinating with OPEC to raise prices, following allegations that the former head of Pioneer Natural Resources Co. colluded with the cartel.】

item.title: 卢拉发出削减开支的开放信号，提振巴西雷亚尔
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）表示对削减开支持开放态度，这导致掉期利率上行，雷亚尔也从早些时候的跌势中反弹。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva signaled an openness to spending cuts, causing swap rates to trim an upward move and the real to rebound from earlier losses.】

item.title: 欧莱雅首席执行官认为中国美容市场增长放缓
item.description: 欧莱雅集团首席执行官表示，由于中国市场在多年快速增长后出现疲软，拖累了销售额，预计今年整个美容市场的增长将放缓。【原文：L’Oreal SA expects slower growth for the overall beauty market this year, according to its CEO, as weakness in China weighs on sales after years of rapid gains.】

item.title: Naver 支持的 Webtoon 在首次公开募股定价最高后股价上涨 9
item.description: Webtoon Entertainment Inc.在美国首次公开发行股票，募集资金 3.15 亿美元，发行价为市场定价范围的上限。【原文：Webtoon Entertainment Inc. shares climbed as much as 14% in the online comics company’s debut after a US initial public offering that raised $315 million, priced at the upper end of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国 IPO 信心回升，迎来 2021 年以来最佳开局

item.title: 拜登与特朗普针锋相对，电动汽车、芯片和加密货币股票成为焦点
item.description: 股市已基本摆脱了 11 月美国大选的不确定性。周四晚，美国总统乔-拜登和前总统唐纳德-特朗普将在大选的第一场辩论中对决，届时这种情况可能会发生变化。【原文：The stock market has largely brushed off the uncertainty around November’s US election. That may change Thursday evening, when President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump face off in the first debate in the race.】

item.title: 据说土耳其亿万富翁将为委内瑞拉工厂出资 7.5 亿美元
item.description: 据一位高级政府官员称，土耳其亿万富翁罗伯特-尤克塞尔-耶尔德里姆（Robert Yuksel Yildirim）的控股公司签署了一项 7.5 亿美元的投资协议，用于在委内瑞拉东部建设一家合成氨厂。【原文：Turkish billionaire Robert Yuksel Yildirim’s holding company signed a $750 million investment for the construction of an ammonia plant in eastern Venezuela, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率下降，徘徊在 4 月初以来最低点
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续四周下滑。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US slipped for a fourth straight week.】

item.title: Balyasny 和 Schonfeld 在交易混乱中切断了合并弧形交易圈
item.description: Balyasny Asset Management 和 Schonfeld Strategic Advisors 正在与他们的一些专门从事并购的交易员分道扬镳，熟悉内情的人士称，这是因为全球交易环境面临着持续的挑战。【原文：Balyasny Asset Management and Schonfeld Strategic Advisors are parting ways with some of their traders specializing in mergers and acquisitions, people familiar with the matter said, amid ongoing challenges in the global dealmaking environment.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会高层关注私人信贷估值和不透明问题
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会的最高执法官员越来越关注蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场。【原文：The booming private credit market is of growing concern to the top enforcement official at the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 以色列法院为何下令征召极端东正教男子入伍？
item.description: 以色列最高法院于 6 月 25 日裁定，军队必须开始征召极端东正教犹太人。这项裁决结束了以色列建国以来的一项豁免。在以色列进行加沙战争之际，这一裁决给本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理的联合政府带来了压力，并可能为该国 130 万极端东正教徒（又称哈里迪姆人）开启一个深刻的变革进程。如果他们开始服兵役，一些人可能会离开这个圈子。【原文：Israel’s Supreme Court ruled on June 25 that the military must start conscripting ultra-Orthodox Jews. The ruling ends an exemption that goes back to the state’s founding. It is putting pressure on Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s coalition government as Israel fights a war in Gaza and is likely to start a process of profound change for the country’s 1.3 million ultra-Orthodox, also known as Haredim. If they start to serve in the army, some may leave the fold.】
